title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE'S NOTE
description: She's left you a note on her table

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje's Note: ""I'm sorry I fucked everyone over...."
dialogueTree.english:
"I'm sorry I fucked everyone over.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."
dialogueTree.polish:
„Przepraszam, że wszystkich zrobiłam w chuja.
PS Nie zabiłam go.
PPS Prezent na górze”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Прабачце, што ўсіх падманула. PS Я яго не забіла. PPS Падарунак наверсе".

Alternate1.english:
"See you at The Return.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."
Alternate1.polish:
„Zobaczymy się po Powrocie.
PS Nie zabiłam go.
PPS Prezent na górze”.
Alternate1.belarusian: "Убачымся пасля Вяртання. PS Я не забіла яго. PPS Падарунак наверсе".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not drawing my gun... yet. Bu..."
links.english: "I am not drawing my gun... yet. But I don't like 'gifts'."
links.polish: „Nie chwytam za broń... jeszcze. Ale nie lubię »prezentów«”.
links.belarusian: "Я не бяру ў рукі зброю... пакуль. Але не люблю "падарункаў"".

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He says he's not, but his hand move..."
links.english: He says he's not, but his hand moves instinctively toward his holster as he studies the note.
links.polish: Mówi, że nie chwyta, ale kiedy przygląda się notce, jego ręka instynktownie sięga ku kaburze.
links.belarusian: Ён кажа, што не разумее, але калі ён узглядае на заметку, яго рука інстынктыўна цягнецца да кабуры.

links.title: Half Light: "Just don't walk into another radio..."
links.english: Just don't walk into another radio trap, okay...
links.polish: Tylko nie wpakuj się w kolejną radiową pułapkę, okej...?
links.belarusian: Толькі не трапся ў чарговую радыёпаўку, добра...?

links.title: Volition: "Relax. Not everyone is out to trap..."
links.english: Relax. Not everyone is out to trap you.
links.polish: Spokojnie. Nie wszyscy próbują cię usidlić.
links.belarusian: Супакойся. Не ўсе спрабуюць цябе спаймаць.

links.title: Cuno: ""A trap, probably." He nods confide..."
links.english: "A trap, probably." He nods confidently. "But don't sweat it. You got the Cuno spotting you. Let's go in."
links.polish: „To pewnie pułapka” – kiwa głową z przekonaniem. „Ale nie bój nic. Masz wsparcie Cuno. Idziemy”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта, напэўна, пастка", — з упэўненасцю ківае ён галавой. "Але не бойся нічога. У цябе ёсць падтрымка Куна. Ідзем".

links.title: Klaasje's Note: "No response, not even an echo in th..."
links.english: No response, not even an echo in the stuffy room. You notice a silk shirt on the stairs.
links.polish: Żadnej odpowiedzi. Nawet echo nie zaszczyca swoją obecnością dusznego pokoju. Na schodach zauważasz jedwabną koszulę.
links.belarusian: Няма адказу. Нават рэха не ўшаноўвае сваёй прысутнасцю душны пакой. На лесвіцы заўважаеш шаўковую кашулю.

links.title: You: "Seems she left in a hurry."
links.english: Seems she left in a hurry.
links.polish: Zdaje się, że uciekała w pośpiechu.
links.belarusian: Здаецца, што яна ўцякала ў спешцы.

links.title: Interfacing: "You look at her rough, jagged handw..."
links.english: You look at her rough, jagged handwriting on the note. She was in a rush, but not panicked. Deliberate. Focused.
links.polish: Spoglądasz na jej nierówne, nieco drżące pismo z notki. Spieszyła się, ale nie panikowała. Pisała spokojnie. W skupieniu.
links.belarusian: Ты глядзіш на яе няроўнае, крыху дрыжачае пісьмо з нататкі. Яна спяшалася, але не панікавала. Пісала спакойна. З задуменнем.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah-yeah." He looks around. "Fugi..."
links.english: "Yeah-yeah." He looks around. "Fugitive on the run shit. Cuno's seen this shit before."
links.polish: „Taa” – rozgląda się. „Uciekinierka, co daje nogę. Cuno już to widział”.
links.belarusian: "Так" – аглядаецца. "Уцекачка, што збягае. Куна ўжо гэта бачыў".

links.title: Klaasje's Note: "The note does not reply. The jagged..."
links.english: The note does not reply. The jagged, rough handwriting looks like she was in a hurry.
links.polish: Notatka nie odpowiada. Niestaranne pismo odręczne wskazuje, że autorka się spieszyła.
links.belarusian: Запіска не адпавядае. Няўважлівы почырк сведчыць пра тое, што аўтарка спяшалася.

links.title: Interfacing: "But not panicked. Deliberate. Focus..."
links.polish: Ale nie panikowała. Pisała spokojnie. W skupieniu.
links.belarusian: Але не панікавала. Пісала спакойна. У засяроджанні.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje's Note: "Next to stacks of bills, you see a..."
dialogueTree.english: Next to stacks of bills, you see a note -- a few lines jotted down in large, uneven handwriting just as the writer was about to rush out the door.
dialogueTree.polish: Obok sterty rachunków widzisz notatkę – kilka linijek skreślonych odręcznie dużym, nierównym pismem, jak gdyby autor miał zaraz wybiec w pośpiechu.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Побач са стосам рахункаў ты бачыш нататку — некалькі радкоў, закрэсленых ад рукі буйным, няроўным почыркам, як быццам аўтар збіраўся вось-вось выбегчы ў спешцы.

links.title: Klaasje's Note: ""See you at The Return. PS. I di..."
links.english:
"See you at The Return.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."
links.polish:
„Zobaczymy się po Powrocie.
PS Nie zabiłam go.
PPS Prezent na górze”.
links.belarusian: "Пабачымся пасля Вяртання. PS Я не забіла яго. PPS Падарунак зверху".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A gift..." The lieutenant turns to..."
links.english: "A gift..." The lieutenant turns to the staircase suspiciously, looking for any signs of another presence in the shadows above.
links.polish: „Prezent...” – porucznik obraca się podejrzliwie w stronę schodów, wyglądając oznak czyjejś obecności w zalegających na piętrze cieniach.
links.belarusian: "Прэзент..." – лейтэнант падазрона паварочваецца ў бок лесвіцы, выглядаючы прыкметы чыйго-небудзь прысутнасці ў ценях на паверсе.

links.title: Cuno: ""A gift, huh... ?" The kid turns to..."
links.english: "A gift, huh... ?" The kid turns to the staircase. "That's fucking suspicious to Cuno."
links.polish: „Prezent, co...?” – chłopak obraca się w kierunku schodów. „Według Cuno to zajebiście podejrzane”.
links.belarusian: "Падарунак, што...?" – хлопец паварочваецца ў бок лесвіцы. "На думку Куна, гэта страшэнна падазрона".

links.title: Klaasje's Note: ""I'm sorry I fucked everyone over...."
links.english:
"I'm sorry I fucked everyone over.

PS. I didn't kill him.

PPS. Gift upstairs."
links.polish:
„Przepraszam, że wszystkich zrobiłam w chuja.
PS Nie zabiłam go.
PPS Prezent na górze”.
links.belarusian: "Прабачце, што ўсіх падманула. PS Я яго не забіла. PPS Падарунак наверсе".
